snippet.title: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution - Console/PC Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The lost Shantae adventure, Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution, is back in development after 20 years and coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and PC! Join Shantae as she turns the tables on nefarious pirate Risky Boots by rearranging the landscape and swapping between mix-and-match multilayered levels, then hair-whip and belly-dance your way through scrambled lands, misplaced towns, monster-filled crypts, and daunting labyrinths. Plus: 4-player Battle Mode! Coming in 2024! 
More details: https://wayforward.com/news/shantae-advance-risky-revolution-announced-for-consoles-and-pc
